trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en digital signatur som tillämpas på en uppsättning paketdelar och relationer.

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created.
trans-unit.target: Ett PackageDigitalSignature-objekt är oföränderlig och kan inte ändras när den har skapats.

trans-unit.source: For security, a PackageDigitalSignature can be associated with parts within a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: För säkerhet, kan en PackageDigitalSignature associeras med webbdelar i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part.
trans-unit.target: En PackageDigitalSignature innehåller ett X.509-certifikat som innehåller två funktioner: – identifierar och autentiserar del skickat.

trans-unit.source: - Validates that the part has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Verifierar delen inte har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way.
trans-unit.target: Den digitala signaturen hindra inte en del ändras, men en valideringskontrollen gentemot signaturen misslyckas om delen har ändrats på något sätt.

trans-unit.source: The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan sedan vidta lämpliga åtgärder, t.ex, det kan förhindra att delen öppnas eller den kan meddela användaren att delen har ändrats och att den inte är säker.

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om paketet digitala signaturer finns i MSDN-artikeln [Digital signering av ramverket för Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar bädda in alternativet X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|In its own certificate <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in the package.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat som används för att validera ett paket kan lagras i en av tre platser: ||| |-|-| | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| I sitt eget certifikat <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>i paketet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|Within the content of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> in the package.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikatet kan hämtas via egenskapen <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| I innehållet för den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A>i paketet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikatet kan hämtas via egenskapen <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Externa paket på en plats som är känd av både det program som skapar signaturen och program som använder senare signaturen för verifiering. |</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"></xref> values that specifies the option for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"> </xref> värden som anger du alternativ för digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered list of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> operations applied to a given part.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en sorterad lista över de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> åtgärder som tillämpas på en viss del.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the transform list for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>av den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> att returnera transformeringen lista för</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An ordered list of URI strings, such as or , that represents the canonical XML transformations applied to the part with the given partName URI.
trans-unit.target: En sorterad lista över URI strängar som eller , som representerar kanoniska XML-transformeringar tillämpas på delen med den angivna partName URI.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den digitala signaturen som XML.

trans-unit.source: Signature provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that hosts the signature.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen ger åtkomst till klassen foundation som utför typspecifika signatur kryptografiska funktioner och serialisering till och från den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>som är värd för signaturen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: XML-signatur.

trans-unit.source: The digital Signature has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den digitala signaturen har tagits bort.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> som innehåller signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The signature's package part is frequently accessed when the signature is countersigned.
trans-unit.target: Paketet signaturdelen används ofta när signaturen undertecknas.

trans-unit.source: The package part that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Den paketdel som innehåller signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sträng som identifierar Signaturtyp.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sträng som identifierar Signaturtyp.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar krypterade hash-värdet i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: En bytematris som innehåller krypterade hashvärdet i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling med alla de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objekt som har signerats med signaturen.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the package parts signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: En samling som innehåller alla paketdelar signeras med signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar listan över de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> delar som har signerats med signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Lista över de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> delar som har signerats med signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar undertecknarens X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: Signer returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Signerare returnerar X.509-certifikat undertecknarens när digitalt certifikat lagras i paketet (det vill säga när <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>är <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>eller <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Signer returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Signerare returnerar `null` när X.509-certifikatet lagras inte i paketet (det vill säga när <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>är <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital certificate of the signer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the certificate is not stored in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Undertecknare, digitala certifikat eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om certifikatet inte lagras i den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar datum och tid då signaturen skapades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A> property specifies the format of the date.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>egenskapen anger formatet för datum.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the SigningTime string is based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in effect when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Formatet för SigningTime-strängen är baserad på den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i kraft när signaturen har skapats.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime baseras på systemklockan på den dator där den signering ägde rum.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime är inte en "säker tidsstämpel" och är inte betrodd tidsstämpel utfärdare.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: En säker tidsstämpel måste hämtas och tillämpas via en betrodd tidsstämpel utfärdare.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Datum och tid då signaturen skapades.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar formatet för datum och tid som returneras av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note.
trans-unit.target: Tidsvärdet format följer syntaxen för W3C [tids- och datumformat](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) anteckning.

trans-unit.source: The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown.
trans-unit.target: De komponenter som visas i följande tabell måste använda syntax och skiljetecken visas.

trans-unit.source: |TimeFormat|Description|Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYY|Year|2005| |YYYY-MM|Year and month|2005-07| |YYYY-MM-DD|Complete date|2005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| where: ||| |-|-| |YYYY|four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MM|two-digit month (01=January)| |DD|two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |Thh|two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mm|two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ss|two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |s|one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZD|time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|
trans-unit.target: | TimeFormat | Beskrivning | Exempel | |----------------|-----------------|-------------| | ÅÅÅÅ | År | 2005 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM | År och månad | 2005-07 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DD | Slutfört datum | 2005-07-28 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mmTZD | Slutföra datum plus timmar och minuter | 2005-07-28T19:20-01:00 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD | Slutföra datum plus timmar, minuter och sekunder | 2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD| Slutföra datum plus timmar, minuter och sekunder med ett decimaltal | 2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00 | där: ||| |-|-| | ÅÅÅÅ | årtal (till exempel 2006) | | MM | månad med två siffror (01 = januari) | | DD | tvåsiffrig dagen i månaden (01 till och med 31) | | Thh | tvåsiffrig timme (00 via 23 24-timmarsformat) | | mm | två siffror minuter (00-59) | | ss | två siffror sekunder (00-59) | | s | en eller flera siffror som representerar ett decimaltal med en andra | | TZD | tidszon beteckning (Z eller + hh: mm eller -hh: mm) |

trans-unit.source: The format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Formatet för datum och tid som returneras av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifiera den digitala signaturen mot ett X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden verifierar signaturen mot ett inbäddat X.509-certifikat som lagras i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Om verifieringen lyckades Annars en av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> värden som identifierar ett problem.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifiera den digitala signaturen mot ett visst X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: The signer's X.509 certificate to verify the digital signature against.
trans-unit.target: Undertecknarens X.509-certifikat för att verifiera den digitala signaturen mot.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Om verifieringen lyckades Annars en av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> värden som identifierar ett problem.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har tagits bort.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>
